name: Articuno
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

ancient_trait.name: Δ  Plus
ancient_trait.effect: If your opponent’s Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack of this Pokémon, take 1 more Prize card.

attacks.name: Chilling Sigh
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Tri Edge
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.
